title: 110_hr3907
content: Small Business Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the work opportunity tax credit, the new markets tax credit, and the tax credit for increasing research activities. (2) make permanent accelerated depreciation of qualified leasehold improvement and restaurant property and expensing of environmental remediation expenditures. (3) increase the partial tax exclusion of gain from sales of certain small business stock for noncorporate business taxpayers and businesses in an empowerment zone. (4) permit certain small businesses to elect taxable years ending between April and November. (5) increase the allowable number of S corporation shareholders from 100 to 150. And (6) exempt certain small businesses from the 3 withholding requirement applicable to payments made to such businesses by government entities.
